summary.div: Important Deprecated. This API may be removed from future releases of Windows. Applications should use the Media Session for playback.
summary.para: Event structure for the MFP_EVENT_TYPE_MEDIAITEM_CLEARED event. This event is sent when the method completes.

member.name: MFP_MEDIAITEM_CLEARED_EVENT.header
member.summary: structure that contains data common to all events.

member.name: MFP_MEDIAITEM_CLEARED_EVENT.pMediaItem
member.summary: Pointer to the interface of the media item that was cleared.
